Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Koya', 3: 'You seem excited. Are you sure you can keep your M.I.N.D. stable like that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Don't you worry, I know what to do.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "Looks like someone's looking forward to the next mission.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Of course, I've been trained for so long just for the upcoming battle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: 'That is why we Constructs were created after all.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "But I haven't been to a battlefield yet, and I don't know if I can adapt to it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Don't worry, since humans created us to defend the earth, we can certainly fight!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: 'Haha, you have a point.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: 'Speaking of the battle power, the two people you just talked to seem to be very strong Constructs.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Of course they do. Lucia and Watanabe are well-experienced Constructs. They have been through a lot of battles, and they are pure Attacker Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But I won't lose to them either!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "Let's hope that I can be assigned to the same batch with them later, so that I can gain a lot of combat experience from them in close range.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'True that!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But I think you're strong, too, Koya. I'd like to spar with you if I ever get the chance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "Haha, I just hope that I won't be a burden.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "That won't be the case. The Constructs are powerful, so you must be powerful too!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "Let's hope so.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Koya', 3: "It's time to assemble. Let's go now.", 4: '2'}
